lines.text: They might have been party to a crime, we don't know. We're investigators.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see across the way Ashton's like, (gasps) and the dwarf goes, "Well then, best go "talk to them." Gives them a little kick to the side, and they both take their hammers down. They take the metal off and put it back in the forge to heat, and they both rest and cross their arms and watch. The two boys look at each other and sheepishly step forward. "Hi, miss. What can we "do? What are you asking about?" "Yeah, what can we do?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We talk in here, or are we going to take them outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rissa goes, "I don't know. Kind of like to do it in a place of business, that way we can keep "it above the board, you know?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. I'm sure their employers are not fond of thieves in their midst.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look back at the boys and I say: Sit the fuck down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, it's on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both grab nearby stools and sit down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here's the deal. This guy's super fucking charming. He's going to talk to you first. You don't want to talk to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's not charming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the least.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Deal." "Deal."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My man Fjord is up!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wave my hands a little bit and say, "I suggest you help this one find the things that we "are looking for," and I cast Suggest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC on that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is 16, wisdom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On one of them or both?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one, Ashton or Fitz?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fitz.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Fitz did seem like a prick, didn't he?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like that it was not even a question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fitz looks at you and goes-- and looks right to Fjord, the spell seemingly taking effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I crack my knuckles, intimidate them a bit from behind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fitz, I understand that you might have felt a little slighted by last night's encounter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, no, you know, I'm just--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't say you could talk. What I want to know is, when you came back into the bar last night, did you see fit to rummage your way through some good, hard-working people's coin purses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His eyes go wide. "No, not at all, no. What? I wouldn't. I earn my money."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about your friend Ashton over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashton looks back. "No, sir, we were just looking-- we were just joshing, we were just "playing with Rissa, that was all!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out my staff. Do a cool little flourish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See, now we're in a dangerous territory, because once that staff comes out, she's got to hit something with it, and it's not going to be me. Listen, Fitz. The best thing you can do here is wrack your brain real hard, and think: have you ever seen anyone around that establishment that might take advantage of some people enjoying some good imbibements?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whimpering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Fitz. Tick tock, tick tock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know! Maybe, um--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take a few steps forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Jesus. It's not really my strong suit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, it's mine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let you both make one, because you're doing it together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's not too bad. 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both look at each other and like, (stuttering) "There are probably some people who "could've taken things. I don't know. There are shady folk in there all the time! We don't have "your money! I swear I didn't do anything!" (sobbing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're making kids cry. This is amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashton's like, "Come on! Get it together!" and kicks him and is like, "We're being completely "honest. We saw nothing, we took nothing. We were just getting our rocks off freaking people out, "and then we went back and got some drinks."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't know anyone else that has made a habit of doing this regularly, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not personally, no. Most of them end up in the Gearhold."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I pour this vial of acid on them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You might get it ready, Nott. I feel like we're not getting anywhere here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know where Ol' Blemmy is from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both look at each other. "Well, originally, he used to be an ice sailor up north, "by Ice Haven, but he retired ten years ago."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! Now! Where does he live now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, ice sailor sounds like the coolest job. What does that even mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ice sailor would be a person that forges the frozen depths up north.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The people you see on The Deadliest Catch? It's that kind of a job.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mixed with Ice Road Truckers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fitz, I'm going to talk to my colleague here. If you move, Beau is going to take your head off. Don't. Move. (whispering) Okay, we got them right where we want them. Just fucking act like you don't like what I'm saying. Look agitated.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look more agitated, right now. More grimace. Give me nostrils. Nasolabial fold. Really work it. There it goes. (louder) All right. I talked to her, Fitz. Listen, she will stay her staff if, in the next 24 hours, you work your ass off and you find out who took our money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, okay."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God, my staff is just vibrating--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Easy, Beau. Remember what you said!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know about this, Fjord!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is not going to go well for you unless you can produce some results.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks to Ashton. Ashton's like, "Okay! (stuttering) No, we'll ask around! We'll do-- "that's okay! When the bosses-- " "You can look when you're done with the forge. When the whistles "blow? Have at it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fitz, I suggested that you do everything in your power to help my friend Fjord, and for the next eight hours, that is what you will do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fitz is like, "I have to work! It's my livelihood!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, if you got to work, you got even less time. Better be motivated.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, in this case, I would weigh between your livelihood and your life. Can't have one without the other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. You guys, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? What's wrong?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Their spirits are pretty crushed right now, and they're both like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're going to get fired.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You feel bad?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much do these young men make in a day here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both look at each other. "On a good day? We give them about a gold for a day's work."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why don't we stake their salary for the day? We take care of that, double it even. We need these two. We pay for the loss of their work today?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They nod. The gnome steps forward, takes the coin, if you present it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have any.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's four gold, so that's three of them for the two gold. He goes, "Okay, you boys go get "your work done here and we'll find some replacements, and you hope they aren't better than "you are." The boys are like, "Yes! Yes, sir!" "Yes, sir!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I crack my staff on the floor and I say: Get fucking moving, then!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They get up and grab their stuff and then dart out into the street.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I shoot them down while they run?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two forge workers--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a pause, like the two workers at the forge look at each other and look at you guys and go (laughs). "I'm not going to lie, those boys are going to be pissing their pants for a week after "that. That was enjoyable."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, might scare them straight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope so. They need it. They're a couple of pissants. Anyway, we've got to go find some "replacements, but thank you for helping out with the transition, at least."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's our pleasure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We hate to bother you, also, but we did actually get robbed, and if you have any idea where we should start looking to actually--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone. Everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both look at each other and be like, "Maybe ask down at the Assembly Yard? There's a "bunch of weird folks that wander down there."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like weird folks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lifelong industrial hammer workers. Not a lot of craft and skill. Mind gets a bit addled."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bless you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. Anyway, we've got to go get back to work."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We take our leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys wander outside?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the way out, can I just ask that gentleman: Do you make any of those things that we've seen around here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scissors?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Octopi?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (stammering) The pistols. Do you make those here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those are all regulated by the Empire. Those are "designed down in the Assembly Yard."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Thank you. Good day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or that would be the Iron Lot is where that would be made.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Iron Lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, when we were in there, the shields and swords, they looked fairly standard, or were there some that were like "holy shit!"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they seemed pretty standard. I mean, well-made. Looks like a lot of places like this are in the process of developing weaponry, not just for home use, but probably sending it out for the field.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Rissa, how far are we from this Assembly Yard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes, "The Assembly Yard is down in the bottom half of the city, so it's say about an "hour, hour and a half walk?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And just out of curiosity, the Silver Falls, the residential area, how far is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, that's that way, about 25 minutes to get to the actual Falls themselves, and you see "all the little towers over there, those are where all the homes are assembled in that place."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ol' Blemmy's over in the Silver Falls, that residential area. Do we want to go there, or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our list of suspects is as follows!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (softly) Oh, shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The pianist! Blemmy! Rissa! The girl!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The little girl that was asking for money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fitz and Ashton! We've eliminated as possible suspects: Fitz and Ashton, really, they're really lame. The pianist!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because you did Locate Object within his--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're right, that's true, we did do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rissa! Because she was in Zone of Truth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That leaves our suspects Blemmy! And the girl.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we have no leads on the girl, correct? No one saw her, knows her name--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Blemmy might know the girl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw her. But I did not ask her name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But! She has your copper pieces!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I gave her silver!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did! Could you find those specific silver pieces? Or the money she stole from us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you bite your silver pieces before you put them in your coin purse?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you lick it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't. But I do draw dicks on a lot of my money. But I don't think I did it to those.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, little tiny dicks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I have really good paint, you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we go find Blemmy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Silver Falls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where the finger towers apartments are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can keep asking, has anyone had anything purchased--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a lot of money!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With dicks on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That, too. No, wait, because they didn't steal my money.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If there was a way to ask about--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a whole pouch full of money, you guys, right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you could ask about large purchases, that would be a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Big pouch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Silver Falls?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Silver Falls!

lines.name: SAM, MATT, LAURA
lines.text: (singing to tune of Silver Bells) Silver Falls...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With Rissa guiding you guys back, you manage to make your way outside of the main Idle Shelf area and in towards the cluster of the Silver Falls. As you approach, you can see the beautiful, very wide waterfall that cascades down about a thousand feet, across the mountainside, until eventually it falls into this large lake, where you can see columns of steam are rising up. The closer you get, you begin to realize that there is an element of this lake, this waterfall, and some sort of a steam engine-type mechanism built into the surrounding rock that they use to fuel probably the furnaces and elements of the technology within this city. As you begin to hit the residential area, you can see these large, somewhat crooked-looking towers that themselves are maybe what would be the equivalent of 1500- to 1000-square-foot apartments, but stacked four or five on top of each other, with spiraling stairs on the outside to go to each level. There aren't a lot of folks currently at home, other than stay-at-home dads or moms that are watching children, some folks that are putting out laundry on lines that are connecting between multiple towers and are dangling up two or three stories above the street. But they're all made of dark irons and blacker metals, so it gives the district this very weirdly-- what's the word I'm looking for? A whimsical Industrial Revolution feel. It's a unique mixture.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dr. Seuss meets--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of. Or a hint of Howl's Moving Castle in places. There's also that spray of the waterfall hitting the lake behind, which gives occasionally this light misting of water through the air. You can see faint bits of rainbow that come through where the mist hits the sunlight as it makes its way across the waterfall spray.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You said the waterfall goes up a thousand feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the apartments don't go as high as that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if I got in the middle of the area and cast Locate Object, it would do a really big radius. It would reach at least the top of the buildings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, very much so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you make your way through, you're not entirely sure where Ol' Blemmy is, but you make your way towards where the middle, Rissa says, of the district is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keeping an eye out for old, craggly sailor-types.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me? Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I cast Locate Object while we're walking around?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In a center spot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you be able to cast it again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I mean, if I use up all my spells today as like, this kind of thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why did you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 2nd-level spell. Do you want to cast it again or not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just while we stroll through the town?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Through the residential district.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. I guess. What are you searching for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The drinking coins, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, the tokens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tokens?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's the best way to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cast spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not quite in the district, but right where the Idleworks Shelf transitions into the residential area on the Idleworks Shelf. You get (boop).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Ah! I turn around and start running towards it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Follow her! She's a bloodhound!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Throwing up while we do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys dart after Jester, making your way down the road, running, (panting). You're closing the distance. You weave through a couple buildings. You're out of the residential part of the district again and you're back into the Idle Shelf, but on the very back end of it. There's warehouses and there's small buildings, and eventually, you come to the destination and it looks like it's a small building. There's a sign out front that just says, "Butcher." And it's boarded up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. That motherfucker had leather apron with shitty-ass sleeves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He totally fucking did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was it Blemmy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it was the guy with the nasty fucking beard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They all had nasty beards. Duncan, Valkin, Ruth, and Tanya.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was Duncan!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Duncan! That was his name! Right, the guy that you drank across?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should probably keep our voices down in the street--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's turn it down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, was Duncan the nerdy guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The first guy was Duncan. Valkin was the next guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Valkin was the guy that fought Caleb. Okay, let's go. Should we just go in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Who's going to guard the back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we're going to circle around?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck yeah! If she's getting a beacon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Kiri pulls out her knife and goes, (like Jester) "I can send a message."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no. No, Kiri, this is where we're stealthy, all right? Knife goes away. Shh. Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Fjord) "Shh. Nice"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we want to send Nott or a cat in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a roof to this thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a roof, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two story? One story?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's maybe three rooms?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I parkour on the roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, wait. Can we surround it first? Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's already up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She hops up there, I run around the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We surround the building.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay in the front.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh! 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys surround it. (landing footfalls)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there any chimneys? Soft spots in the floor? Skylights?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There isn't a skylight, per se, but you do see there is a little smokestack that's about three feet wide or so. Two and a half feet wide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to peek in. Can I see down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (fake coughs) Okay. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Glancing inside, it's dark, except for you can see the little beams of sunlight that are coming through the slats of wood on the roof.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goggles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing inside, looking through, you can see four figures in there that are currently not moving and they're all clustered together in the far corner.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do they look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look gnome in size.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. They're just huddled together, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're huddled together, and they're not moving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will take out my wire and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look and they're starting to look around, like they might have heard a noise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I whisper to Beau using Message, "What do you see? You can reply to this message."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) Four individuals. Huddled around. They're either the assholes or hostages, it's hard to say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Should we all go in at the same time? Oh you can't hear me; we're not Messaging together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) I'm just talking to myself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, I'm going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know what you're doing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a door or a window on the back at all, or is it just like--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, there's a door in the front, and a door at the back. The door in the front is like a sectional door, a top and a bottom, looks like it can be opened separately to sell out or wants to bring and sell meat over that side. The back is just a general door; it looks almost like a storage space or a back entry to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outstanding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No open windows?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we draw them out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are windows, but they're boarded over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just going to bust in? What if they have traps and bombs?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to very gingerly lean over the edge of the roof where Fjord is. I'm going to say: (whispers) On the boom!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispers) Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go back over to the chimney very gingerly, pull out one of the firecrackers, one of the bottle rockets, light it with the tinderbox, and drop it in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the chimney wide enough for me to fit in? Santa Claus-style?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try, yeah. You can certainly try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was a back door, too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Front door, back door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's at the back door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys are at the front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (loud popping) It goes off. On the inside is a flash of light. You hear screams.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going in!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all burst inside. As you break through the doors, wood splinters on the inside, light breaks in, and in the corner you can see what looks to be four gnomish children.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're just like (panting).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You took the money! It was the little girl!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Easy. Easy. Easy. We're not going to hurt you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will kill them all!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, Nott! It's fine. You're not in any danger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a gnome girl, the equivalent of like 17 or so with very brown, curled hair, it's this uncontrolled mass, dirty on the cheek. A younger boy with short red hair is the other protector of the two. Their clothes are pretty dirty. Then there's the younger girl that you saw wandering through the tavern, who's on the ground clutching a stuffed bear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't I say it right away? I said it right away!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a boy that's a little older than her, about nine you would say, equivalent, with very long, brown hair that's around the shoulders, and they all just look scared.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott Detective Agency always gets their man! It's all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey. I know you, I saw you. Right? I gave you some money?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (coughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's not talking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You. Stole. From. Our. Friends. Not. Cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You went down a chimney.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not in character.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (coughing) Sorry, wrong pipe. Keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I totally thought you were just doing the "went down the chimney."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (coughing) As I cough my way down the chimney, "I'm coming!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look up as she comes out the bottom in a big old plume of soot. Just covered.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a little late and I look at the girl and I say: It was you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, Beau, we're already winning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The older girl, "Look, we don't mean nothing, we're just trying to get by, okay? We "didn't realize how much you had on you, and to be honest, it was both exciting and scary. Just don't "hurt anyone, please."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not going to hurt you. Just give it all back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Take it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No parents at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The girl looks sad for a moment, saying, "Not for a little while."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much have you hoarded up here? Just us, or more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've scrambled coins here and there over time, keep on by. Most everyone here only keeps a "few coins in their pockets. Hence our surprise when this came about." The younger boy goes like, "Yeah, we don't expect this kind of a payload."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How old are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The older girl goes, "I'm Gail. I'm 17."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gail!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The older boy goes, "I'm Austin." The little boy with longer curly hair goes, "I'm Jude." The older girl points to the little girl and goes, "That's Layla."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said you haven't had your parents around for a while now? What happened to them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all look at each other, and the older boy sits forward and goes, "Well, they got "arrested."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doing what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Got arrested for idol worship. False worship."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here? In Hupperdook?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What god were they worshiping?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it the Traveler?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. Changebringer."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Changebringer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They've been in the Gearhold ever since."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tithe collectors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Often a lot of people get arrested for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You all brothers and sisters?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And your parents' names?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gilda and Wallace Schuster. We're Schusters."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long have you been pickpocketing, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Only about three months."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mostly success at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So far, so good. Most people don't seem to pay much attention to the younger kids."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, this is good. This is a very valuable lesson. If you ever come across a purse like this again, you just take a tiny bit of it, and then leave the rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We just grab it and run, we didn't know how much was here until we got back."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well then, you just bring it back immediately. Obviously you take five percent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, no, I understand." Gail says, "We understand, sir! We've learned our lesson!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, because you were so good at your job, keep this. I hand him 20 gold. Look, I appreciate good work when I see it, all right? You got our shit. That was pretty damn good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gail, you been taking care of your younger siblings this whole time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've been trying, best we can. Our parents worked as butchers, so we had some food to keep us "going for a while, but when stuff got thin and begging wasn't working out, we, you know, did what "was necessary. And I'll do what it takes to make sure my siblings stay healthy."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You been holed up here, or you on the move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've held up here. This is where we grew up."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long before the tithe man comes back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But we ain't much of a business at this time."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anywhere they take kids? Kids separated from their parents? Or do they just not care?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hear stories, they round them up and throw them to Rexxentrum in orphanages, and we "don't want to go there."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you're just avoiding them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gilda and Wallace. Let me ask you, if we were to somehow get your parents out of the Gearhold prison, would you stay here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (nervous chuckle) "How would you intend on getting my parents out of the prison?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm the one asking questions here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, legally? We'd probably stay here and reopen the shop."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't seem to be taking my meaning. If we were to reunite you with your folks, would you get out of town right quick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If it were by means where people would come looking for us, we would definitely be heading "somewhere other than here."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give us a moment, will you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How soft are you getting?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's very clear. We have Kiri already. We take these four children with us, and we keep going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we start a children's band.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Partridge Family.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, exactly!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can teach them the dances that we have been learning, and working on!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I've learned anything, you don't work with animals or children, and we're rapidly getting both!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey man, attach them all by chains to your armor, and you guys are the new Dread Emperor!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Throwback!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth! No, but seriously. Listen, they've obviously done a fair job of taking care of themselves. We could toss them some coin and wish them well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I see no problem with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or, if we're serious about returning Cleff with his (tongue click), might as well see if we can get a little extra friend or two out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's make no promises, but again--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No promises, but man, if we have an opportunity to reunite these kids with their parents, that's a pretty special deed, don't you think?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are so soft!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I ask a shitty question?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, please!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we take the time right now to break their parents out and get that automaton, are we going to lose time on the thing for The Gentleman?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, we are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Man, I entirely forgot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we still have weeks left, don't we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it's still another three or four days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could ask for a three-day extension.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're given the time, you do the job, you finish it, you don't ask questions, you don't ask for special--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Haven't you been working for the circus for two years?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what I'm talking about. When you're in a circus, sometimes you get paid to do gigs. Things have happened. I've run a couple things in my time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Insight check?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's, "Do I believe him?" right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Do I believe him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But insight check has become such a thing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frustratingly so, yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: But the DM hates it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I find it amusing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry. Do I think he's lying?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're a circus! Of course we've robbed people! My god, we have robbed, swindled, we've been robbed, we've gone back and found the people who've robbed them, sometimes we don't! Oh my god, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does that mean that your cards are bullshit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course they're bullshit, they're fucking cards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No they're not, they're super true!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am asking Mollymauk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're asking if my cards are bullshit? My cards are not bullshit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to say "insight check" so bad, but I won't say it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know you do! But you won't say it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, you have a photographic memory, as you remind us every session. How long do we have until our time is up with The Gentleman?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM will fill that information in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see, we had about three days traveling there. Since you left, you have about two and a half weeks, I'll say, estimated at the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long would it take, do we think, to get up north there, if we went straight? A week?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From Hupperdook?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say, off the top of my head, a little under a week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we've got a couple weeks! We have a day or two to spend on some prison breaking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got a day or two to spend on this, but not a week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on. This thing has been a problem for years, the clockwork warden? Why don't we just go, finish our stuff, we have to cross back through here, anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And come back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And come back and finish the job.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We already have a job.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beauregard, don't you think they should be reunited with their father who loves them very much, and wants to be with them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course I do. They've been scrappy for long enough. They can be scrappy for another week or two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They don't even have to be that scrappy now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They said the tithe man could return any day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And take them to an orphanage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if we come back and they're gone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It would be horrible if they were taken away from their home and given to some people who would do horrible things to them, or mistreat them for their whole childhoods, leaving them as cold, heartless, resting bitches.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Didn't you almost open fire on these children not more than 30 seconds ago?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was an intimidation tactic. I would never hurt a child!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course you would!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I wouldn't! I love children.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'd eat a child.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was an accident!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I knew I saw you drooling!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is why I don't miss the circus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. What are we doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We already have a job. I mean, I will defer to the group, but we have a job and we are on a time table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would really like the opportunity to leave this place better than we found it, especially for these kids.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not saying no, I'm just saying remember that we are hired hands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I understand. If it goes sideways, it goes sideways, and we run. But if we can keep them out of an orphanage, I would be most grateful to all of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've done dumber shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, Nott's over here trying to pull my heart strings, but it seems like you should be the target. You have a thing with kids and orphanages?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were you an orphan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Separated from dad?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you ever eaten an orphan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, so much for sticking to the plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were you an orphan?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. I was. They're terrible fucking places.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Say no more. I'm in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I'm interested if there's a master lever to this prison. Just prison break, see what happens.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That sounds like a terrible idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can negotiate our way into the prison and say we'll take care of the automaton, and while we're in there, we can sneak around and set the parents free.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, if we do this, I think we need to give ourselves a hard time limit that we all stick to, because the last thing that I want is for the fucking Gentlemen with his vials of our DNA coming after our asses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Agreed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As long as we give him some notice, I think it will be okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a feeling The Gentleman isn't a guy that negotiates on time periods.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The effort is all I ask for. We're a clever group. Surely we can survey, come up with a plan, try something. If we fail, we fail, and we'll move on with our objective. I can't leave here without trying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like it to be predicated on us coming up with at least a respectable plan, not willy-nilly, fly in with our balls out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also in it for a crossbow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess it doesn't hurt to ask The Gentleman, if worst comes to worst.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just remember, you either get the nickname "The Gentleman" because you are one, or because you're really not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, good point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about we bring the kids back in, we give them a little coin so they stay out of trouble, for the next--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They have 30 gold on them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They got a lot of gold on them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a lot of money.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We tell them to stay put, unless they're getting food.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not going to give them that, because that would be a terrible idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb, how long does your string theory work?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: String theory?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight hours, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight hours, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, it's probably pushing one or two in the afternoon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we have any food we can leave for them, so they don't have to--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have some human jerky left over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did pocket some of the breakfast from this morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, yeah. Do you give that to them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The kids hungrily accept, and devour, evenly dividing amongst them. They feed the younger kids first and then whatever is left over, the older ones take. They say, "Thank you, I really "appreciate that."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a good idea. I'm going to give the older one one of my rings. I've got these strange little rings that I left over. Keep that on you, sell it if you have to, but see if you can hold off for a while. If things go wrong, get within 1,000 feet of the Blushing Tavern, hide and wait, and we'll find you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll keep that in mind, thank you. Thank you kindly." Is it a ring finger, a finger ring?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a finger ring.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: It's a fingering?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was one of the rings that we found in the cave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He puts it over his thumb. For his body and size, it goes over his thumb. It's still a little loose, but it'll stay. "Thank you. I don't know how we'll repay you, but--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Question: what are we going to do with Kiri right now, if we're going down into the jail?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think she has a sleepover--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the girl we found, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Yasha?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or with these fabulous kids right now? No, Yasha needs to come with us. We need her help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Yasha's like, "No, if we're going into a prison to kill something, I want to be there."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true. Sorry. Forgot what time it was!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we know how much the prostitutes cost to watch Kiri.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She said it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or we could drop Kiri off with the little girl that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or Kiri can stay here with these wonderful children.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They are very capable children.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri goes, (like Nott) "That sounds adorable!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Do you want to stay with them?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Okay!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The children do owe us a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Children, oh, Schusters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh Schusters!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys want to watch our little friend here as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping) The little girl walks up and touches the feathers, and you see the feathers of Kiri's head (rustling) and her eyes close for a second as she's scratching the side of her head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's like you, though, so she's not like a pet or anything. She's a real little girl, okay?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey Kiri, show them your music box.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cranking) (music box chiming) It starts playing, and the little girl leans in and they all close in quickly. For a moment, you can see this little unit of kids meeting a new friend, and a friend meeting new kids. You're like, okay, they might be okay for a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You take care of each other. You're a little temporary family for now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going to make some protection.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kinder, this is a thread I am going to put around the chamber that you are living in, and I will know if our little feathered friend or you all leave. You're perfectly welcome to. I'm just letting you know that I will know, ja? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all nod to you. Kiri looks to Fjord and (dagger unsheathing).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Don't stab any of the other kids, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whispers) (like Jester) "Okay."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember, stay quiet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Fjord) "Stay quiet."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! So weird!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leaving the kids there, you all quietly exit the building, reaffirming the doors you had kicked in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah! Going to lean those up against the door jamb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I cast Mending on the doors!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up next week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Such a good game!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, guys!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was funsies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see if--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, we got the money back!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got the money back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: See if you can earn your Tinkertop Boltblaster 1000.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could have just gone back and bought it, but no, we want to go the expert level!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yo, you can buy it or you can collect all 48 pinecones and then you just unlock it. It's like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey man! Good game, guys! Awesome!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should definitely rest before the next part because I just used up all my 2nd-level spells.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll do recon for the afternoon and then we'll attack tomorrow morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless this guy comes in the next week!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If that happens!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my goodness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (bass guitar melody)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
